author: timbeiko
content: You mean Geth/open Ethereum/etc? If so, likely not: we do extensive testing prior to hard fork but very rarely audits (except sometimes for new crypto). 1559 wonâ€™t be different than the EIPS in Berlin in that regard

author: barnabemonnot
content: additionally this is less of a client-specific issue than an economic effect from the protocol. although the work points towards some possible mitigations/optimisations it's likely not going to be pursued before launch I expect, but could be helpful after
